lines.text: We don't travel through time, but around it. Do you understand?
I don't, but maybe he does.
There's only one thing to do.
"Wow! That's the first time a salad's ever tossed me!"
So what are we gonna talk about, the weather?
Yeah, whether we're gonna get outta here!

[trying to encourage the soldiers]
You're the backside of the army, and don't you forget it!
I am Dr. Tanga, and that is Professor Puna.
I've got blisters on my blisters!
Yeah, I'm soft - in the head!

[scolding Pvt. Philbrick]
Remember your status as a volunteer and BLAST DOWN!
